scripts.init-code-hash: npx hardhat run --config hardhat.core.config.js --network localhost scripts/init-code-hash.js

scripts.deploy-router: npx hardhat run --config hardhat.config.js --network localhost scripts/deploy-router.js
scripts.deploy-multicall: npx hardhat run --config hardhat.multicall.config.js --network localhost scripts/deploy-multicall.js
scripts.deploy-token: npx hardhat run --config hardhat.config.js --network localhost scripts/deploy-token.js
